meanings.sent1: She sees him, but hes doesn't see her.
meanings.sent2: He walks to school, and hes always on time.
meanings.sent3: When he asked hes to dance, she blushed.
meanings.sent4: In the story, hes was the hero who saved the day.
meanings.sent5: Hes stood tall, facing his fears with courage.

meanings.sent1: They are brothers, and hes all love playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: The boys went fishing, and hes caught a big fish.
meanings.sent3: At the party, hes were the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, hes stood out with their matching outfits.
meanings.sent5: Hes gathered around the campfire, sharing stories and laughter.

meanings.sent1: He's going to the store to buy some groceries.
meanings.sent2: She knows he's the one who fixed her bike.
meanings.sent3: When he's happy, hes sings and dances around the house.
meanings.sent4: In the play, he's the character who brings everyone together.
meanings.sent5: He's the star of the show, shining brightly on stage.
